title: Abstract: IDS Curriculum v4.0 Access Details
body: This document describes how to access version 4.0 of the IDS Curriculum, which is specifically restricted for users within the Los Angeles Unified School District (LAUSD) only. The curriculum, identified as `IDS_Curriculum_v_4.0`, can be downloaded or previewed via a provided link hosted on UCLA Box at `https://ucla.app.box.com/v/mobilize-ids-curriculum`. This ensures that access is exclusive to the LAUSD educational community.

title: IDS Curriculum v4.0: LAUSD Exclusive Access and File Reference
body: The `IDS_Curriculum_v_4.0` is an educational resource, currently in version 4.0, exclusively designated for use by the Los Angeles Unified School District (LAUSD). Access to this curriculum is restricted solely to LAUSD personnel, emphasizing its specific target audience. The file itself is referenced by its path `.\docs\download\IDS_Curriculum_v_4.0.md`, indicating its location within a documentation structure. Users within LAUSD are granted the ability to either download or preview the content of this curriculum via an external link.

title: Accessing the LAUSD IDS Curriculum v4.0 via UCLA Box
body: To access the `IDS_Curriculum_v_4.0`, which is exclusively available to the Los Angeles Unified School District (LAUSD), users can utilize the provided link for either downloading or previewing the materials. The direct access point is `https://ucla.app.box.com/v/mobilize-ids-curriculum`, hosted on UCLA Box. This secure link allows authorized LAUSD users to interact with the curriculum content. The curriculum's version is identified as 4.0, and its internal documentation path is `.\docs\download\IDS_Curriculum_v_4.0.md`.
